Across the #GreatLakes region, #GLRI has delisted 3 Areas of Concerns, doubled farmland acres under conservation, reduced #harmfulalgalblooms and restored 5,000+ miles of river habitat. Studies also show that for every $1 the GLRI invests, $3 of economic activity is produced.

Had the chance to see firsthand how a local project site in Waite Hill has been transformed thanks to #GLRI. A big thank you to Alex from @WRLConservancy for taking so much time out of his day to to show me the success the program has had right here in #OH14. pic.twitter.com/Jd6JSf3bcA
